item.title: Box Office: ‘Superman’ Crosses $200M Domestically, Targets $56M-$57M Second Weekend
item.description: Elsewhere, new offerings ‘I know What You Did Last Summer’ and ‘Smurfs’ are no match for the Man of Steel and are both eyeing a domestic opening in the $12 million range.
